snippet.title: Crap-Apps Part I: Smartphone Toilet Finders
snippet.description: * Crap-Apps Part I: Smartphone Toilet Finders As I move across country, I’ve been experimenting with smartphone toilet-locator apps. While I’m pretty good at finding restrooms on my own, I thought I’d have a look at what assistance is available. There are a handful of them, but only a few establ...

snippet.title: The 20 Best Weight Loss iPhone & Android Apps 2013
snippet.description: * The 20 Best Weight Loss iPhone & Android Apps 2013 Whether it's the grapefruit or paleo diet, you're always looking for a way to shed weight. Here are 20 popular apps used to drop that weight for good.

snippet.title: Varenicline ( Chantix ) does not produce depression or suicide: new study
snippet.description: * Varenicline ( Chantix ) does not produce depression or suicide: new study The smoking cessation medicine, varenicline, has proven safe and effective in numerous placebo-controlled trials, but in the post-marketing phase there were numerous reports of patients experiencing “neuropsychiatric effects” ranging from poor concen...

snippet.title: Apps That Can Save Your Life
snippet.description: * Apps That Can Save Your Life These smartphone apps help people with food allergies avoid potentially dangerous foods or get treatment faster in the event of accidental exposure.

snippet.title: The 12 Best Allergy iPhone & Android Apps of 2013
snippet.description: * The 12 Best Allergy iPhone & Android Apps of 2013 Allergies can be annoying, debilitating, even life threatening. These apps can help you keep track of what might trigger your allergies.
